quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct in reference to Scheme for Promotion of Research and Innovation in Pharma MedTech Sector (PRIP)?
1. One of the aim is to promote industry academia linkage for R&D in priority areas.
2. It consist of 5 priority areas.
3. Total financial outlay of the scheme is ₹ 15,000 cr.
Which of the following statement is correct with respect to Scheme for Promotion of Research and Innovation in Pharma MedTech Sector (PRIP)?
options: (A) Application can be made by any company registered anywhere in the world.
(B) Focus is on transforming India into a high-volume, high-value player in global market of pharmaceuticals, meeting quality, accessibility, and affordability goals.
(D) Monitoring and Evaluation to be done by Empowered Committee (EC) under chairmanship of Prime Minister.

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s)  is/are incorrect with respect eligibility under National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship Scheme (NMMSS)?
options: (A) Students whose parental income from all sources is not more than ₹8,00,000 per annum are eligible.
(B) Students must have minimum 60% marks or equivalent grade in Class VII examination to appear in selection test (relaxable by 5% for SC/ST students).
(C) Students of Kendriya Vidyalayas and Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalayas and residential schools are not entitled for scholarship.
(E) No scholarship  available for studies abroad for any course

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship Scheme (NMMSS)?1. Objective is to award scholarships to meritorious students of economically weaker sections to arrest their drop out at class VIII.2. Scholarship of ₹18000 per annum is provided, for students studying in State Government, Government-aided, and local body schools.3. 1 lakh fresh scholarships awarded to selected students from Class IX each year and upon their continuation/renewal in Classes X to XII.

Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Per Drop More Crop (PDMC) Scheme?
1. One of objective is to increase area under Micro Irrigation technologies in agriculture to enhance water use efficiency.
2. Initiatives of reuse of waste water in Agriculture/peri-urban Horticulture through micro irrigation systems to be supported.
3. It is being implemented under Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY) from 2015-16.
Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Per Drop More Crop (PDMC) Scheme?
options: (A) It will fulfil vision of “Har Khet Ko Pani” through efficient water conservation (Jal Sanchaya) and water management (Jal Sinchan) practices
(B) Subsidy limited to overall ceiling of 15 hectare per beneficiary.
(C) Beneficiaries, who have already availed subsidy to be eligible for subsidy again for same land only after end of projected life of  micro irrigation system i.e., 7 years
(D) Beneficiaries/Institutions doing contract farming or taken land on lease are also eligible (lease agreement of 7 years is must)

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to Interest Subvention Scheme (ISS)?
options: (A) It provides concessional long term agri-loans to farmers practicing crop husbandry and other allied activities like animal husbandry, dairying and fisheries.
(B) Farmers are given KCC loan at subvented interest rate of 7% per annum for loans upto ₹5 Lakhs.
(C) Benefit also available for post-harvest loans against Negotiable Warehouse Receipts (NWRs) on crop loans.

quiz.text: Which of the following scheme(s) is/are part of Scholarships for Higher Education for Young Achievers Scheme (SHREYAS)?1. Free Coaching Scheme for SCs and OBCs2. Top Class Education for SCs3. Post-Matric Scholarship for OBC, EBC and DNT Students4. Top Class School Education for OBC, EBC and DNT Students5. National Overseas Scheme for SCs

Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to sub-schemes under Scholarships for Higher Education for Young Achievers Scheme (SHREYAS)?1. Under Free Coaching Scheme for SCs and OBCs ceiling of the total family income is Rs. 5 lakhs per annum.2. Under National Overseas Scheme for SCs financial assistance is provided to the selected students from SCs (115 slots); De-notified, Nomadic and Semi-Nomadic Tribes (6 slots); landless agricultural labourers and traditional artisan categories (4 slots), for pursuing masters and Ph.D. level courses abroad.3. Under National Fellowship for SC Students there is no financial ceiling.

Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Scheme for recognition of Internet Service Providers (ISPs)?
1. Department of Telecommunications (DoT), to recognize 20 ISPs who have provided maximum number of net additions in rural Fiber-to-the-Home (FTTH) Connections in a year.
2. Under Category A: minimum 20,000 net additions in rural FTTH connections should be there.
3. Under Category B: minimum of 10,000 net additions in rural FTTH connections should be there.

Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Remission of Duties and Taxes on Exported Products (RoDTEP)?1. Objective is to refund, currently un-refunded duties/taxes/levies, at Central, State and local level, borne on exported product.2. Recently (September 2023) government extends support under Scheme for Remission of Duties and Taxes on Exported Products (RoDTEP) till 30th June 2026.3. It has replaced existing MEIS (Merchandise Exports from India Scheme).
Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to Remission of Duties and Taxes on Exported Products (RoDTEP)?
options: (B) It will operate in  Budgetary framework for each financial year.
(C) Remission of arrears or contingent liabilities is permissible to be carried over to next financial year.
(D) It is implemented through end to end digitization of issuance of rebate amount in form of non-transferable duty credit/electronic scrip (e-scrip).

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to Ayushman Bharat – Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)? A. It aims to cover over 8 crores poor and vulnerable families i.e. bottom 50% of the Indian population. B. Hospitalization only in public hospitals in India is covered under the scheme. C. Benefits of the scheme are portable across the country.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Mr. X who is an artisan, has a family consisting of 6 members is trying to get benefit under Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY), which is the largest health assurance scheme in the world.
Which of the following condition(s) is/are correct with respect to benefits under Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)?
1. Only 5 members of the family will be eligible for health insurance
2. It covers up to 3 days of pre-hospitalization and 50 days post-hospitalization.
3. Children up to 5 years of age avail treatment on the Ayushman Card of their parents
Ayushman Bharat – Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY) was launched in which year?

Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme? 1. Government of India (GOI) contributes 60%, of total outlay for developmental programmes in all the states except states in North East, UT of J&K and Himalayas. 2. It was launched in the year 2016. 3. In the case of North Eastern States, UT of J&K and Himalayan States, GOI contributes 75%.
options: 1 and 2
2 and 3
1 and 3
All of the above

quiz.text: Consider following statements regarding the above mentioned scheme and choose the correct one(s)? 1.Supporting skill development and create employment generation opportunities for rural youth in horticulture and post harvest management, especially in cold chain sector is one of the objectives. 2. This scheme is implemented under National Mission on Natural Farming. 3. It's mission structure consist of General Council at National Level under chairmanship of Prime Minister of India.
Which among the following is not one of the Sub-schemes/Missions under Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH)?
options: Horticulture Mission for North India and Himalayan States

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to objectives of Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana – Remunerative Approach for Agriculture and Allied Sector Rejuvenation (RKVY – RAFTAAR)? 1. Pre & post-harvest agricultural infrastructure to be created. 2. There is no flexibility to states as they have to plan and execute schemes as per direction of Central Government. 3. Risk of farmers to be mitigated with focus on additional income generation activities.
options: 1 and 2
1 and 3
All  of the above

quiz.text: What is the funding ratio between Centre and State Government for states except north eastern and hilly states for the Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana – Remunerative Approach for Agriculture and Allied Sector Rejuvenation (RKVY – RAFTAAR)?
options: 50:50
60:40
75:25
90:10
100:0

quiz.text: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana – Remunerative Approach for Agriculture and Allied Sector Rejuvenation (RKVY – RAFTAAR) re-structured as RKVY Cafeteria Scheme from 2022-23 onwards merging which of the followings? 1. Soil Health & Fertility, Rainfed Area Development 2. Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH) 3. Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana 4. Agriculture Mechanization (including Promotion of Agricultural Mechanization and Management of Crop Residue (CRM)
options: All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Rural Infrastructure Development Fund (RIDF)?1. Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) is acting as Nodal Agency.2. This fund was launched in 2000.3. Sanctioned amount is released on reimbursement basis except for initial mobilisation advance @30% to North Eastern & Hilly States and 20% for other States.
Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Rural Infrastructure Development Fund (RIDF)?
options: (A) Domestic commercial banks contribute to Fund to extent of their shortfall in stipulated priority sector lending to agriculture.
(B) Rural connectivity is one of the 5 categories under the fund.
(C) Loan to be repaid in equal annual instalments within 5 years from date of withdrawal, including a grace period of 1 years.

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to National Agriculture Market (e-NAM) Scheme? 1. To promote better marketing opportunities for farmers / sellers through online access to more buyers / markets, removal of information asymmetry between farmer and trader is one of the objectives.
2. It aims to promote stable prices and availability of quality produce to consumers. 3. National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) is acting as Lead Implementing Agency.

The National Agriculture Market (e-NAM) Scheme being linked to agricultural marketing reforms, the States / Union Territories (UTs) need to undertake mandatory reforms in their Agriculture Produce Market Committee ( APMC)
Acts in respect of which of the following areas to avail the assistance: 1. Single trading license (Unified) to be valid across state 2. Multiple point levy of market fee across state 3. Provision for e-auction/ e-trading as a mode of price discovery
Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to National Agriculture Market (e-NAM) Scheme?
options: (A) Integration with AGMARKNET, KISAN RATH, KISAN SUVIDHA & UMANG PLATFORMS is there under the scheme
(B) Assistance to State/UT for selected APMCs/Regulated Market Committees (RMCs) up to a maximum of ₹80.00 lakhs per mandi
(C) GPS Based eNAM Mandi Locator can locate selected mandi up to radius of 100 Kms
(D) Under FPO (Farmer Producer Organisation) trading module  - FPOs can trade their produce from their collection center without bringing produce to APMC

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the Nai Manzil scheme? A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment. B. It was launched in the year 2015. C. Minimum 70% of youth trained should be successfully placed within 3-months of completion of training.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
Only C
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the Nai Manzil scheme? A. 30% of the beneficiary seats will be earmarked for girl / women candidates. B. 5% of the beneficiary seats will be earmarked for persons with disability belonging to the minority community. C. To promote inter-community solidarity, 15% candidates belonging to BPL families of non-minority communities will also be considered.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the Nai Manzil scheme? A. This programme is supported by Reserve Bank of India. B. It intends to cover people in between 17 to 35 age group from all minority communities. C. The scheme offers non-residential integrated education and skills training for 9 to 12 months.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
Only C
None of the above

quiz.text: Mukhya Mantri Sampoorna Pushti Yojana is launched by which of the following state?
Which of the following state has launched ‘Pada Pusti’ yojana?
